sentence.Network_en: A Bocchicchio hostage was gilt - edged insurance.
sentence.Network_cn: 因此,一个卜启丘人质就等于最把稳的保证.

sentence.Network_en: Twenty - four hundred millions, and all safely planted in Good Things , gilt - edged and interest - bearing.
sentence.Network_cn: 二十四亿块钱, 全都稳稳当当地投在绩优股上, 财源茂盛,稳赚不赔.

sentence.Network_en: A safe investment is blue chips or, better still , gilt - edged securities.
sentence.Network_cn: 一种可靠的投资是买值钱而热门的股票,或者更可靠的一种买安全的金边证券.

entry.tran: （证券或股票）金边的，保险的，定期定息的
entry.def: Gilt-edged stocks or securities are issued by the government for people to invest in for a fixed period of time at a fixed rate of interest.

means.word_mean: 1. of the highest quality or value;
2. having gilded edges as the pages of a book
